messages.title: Only 125 votes in it
messages.content: With Labour out of the race, it's between Sandra and the Tory. The Conservatives want to cut tax for millionaires, and some even think that NHS is a 'mistake' that could be privatised.

messages.title: Defending our NHS
messages.content: No one will be a better voice for our NHS than Sandra Gidley. With years of pharmacy experience and a commitment as a local anti-mat trust teacher, she understands how to make a real difference to our health service in Romsey and Southampton North.

mentions.candidate: Sandra Gidley has experience as a local anti-mat trust teacher and understands how to make a real difference to our health service.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservatives want to cut tax for millionaires, and some even think that NHS is a 'mistake'.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can’t win in Romsey and Southampton North. Only Sandra Gidley can beat the Conservatives in our area.

issues.health: No one will be a better voice for our NHS than Sandra Gidley.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sandra Gidley has been given a clean bill of health by the Parliamentary inquiry into MPs’ expenses.

quotes.text: Sandra Gidley has been given a clean bill of health by the Parliamentary inquiry into MPs' expenses.

images.caption: Graph showing Lib Dem 45%, Con 44%, Lab 9%.
